Interface AppConfigurationInterface

    The App Configuration Interface .

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyForKey

        java.lang.Object getPropertyForKey(java.lang.String key,
                                   java.lang.String group,
                                   AppConfigurationInterface.AppConfigurationError configError)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets property for key.
        Parameters:
        key - the group name
        group - the key
        configError - the config configError as OUT parameter
        Returns:
        the value for key mapped by name, or null if no such mapping exists if value in literal then 'String' Object is returned if value in number then 'Integer' Object is returned if value is array of literal then 'array of String' Object is returned if value is array of number then 'array of Integer' Object is returned if value is Map then 'HashMap' is returned if value is Map then 'HashMap' is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setPropertyForKey

        boolean setPropertyForKey(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String group,
                          java.lang.Object object,
                          AppConfigurationInterface.AppConfigurationError configError)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets property for key.
        Parameters:
        key - the group name
        group - the key
        object - the object (String/Integer/String[]/Integer[]/null/HashMap /HashMap) null to be passed to delete key
        configError - the configError object as OUT parameter
        Returns:
        the set operation status (success/failure)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getDefaultPropertyForKey

        java.lang.Object getDefaultPropertyForKey(java.lang.String key,
                                          java.lang.String group,
                                          AppConfigurationInterface.AppConfigurationError configError)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets property for key from static json file.
        Parameters:
        key - the group name
        group - the key
        configError - the config configError as OUT parameter
        Returns:
        the value for key mapped by name, or null if no such mapping exists if value in literal then 'String' Object is returned if value in number then 'Integer' Object is returned if value is array of literal then 'array of String' Object is returned if value is array of number then 'array of Integer' Object is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • resetConfig

        void resetConfig()
        This method clears dynamic config and downloaded cloud config from both local cache and persistence memory.

        2.2.0
